alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hernando; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Pasco; Hardee; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Highlands, Pasco, southwestern Hernando, northern Hardee, northeastern Manatee, northeastern Pinellas, Hillsborough and Polk Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pine Island to 9 miles northwest of Lakeland to 10 miles southwest of Lake Kissimmee. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Spring Hill, Clearwater, Lakeland, Plant City, Winter Haven, Temple Terrace, Bartow, New Port Richey, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Zephyrhills, Sebring, Avon Park, Wauchula, Hudson, Holiday, Fish Hawk, Lutz and Brandon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
